In the attached photo two members of the group namely Venant and Leonada (a husband and his wife) are not pictured since they are at the hospital taking care of their babe who is sick.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizers, insecticides, and gum boots

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en: Wilson is a 40-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. His current business is tea farming, which he started two years back. He started by growing crops and raised money to buy a tea plantation. His challenges have been seasonal weather, price fluctuations, and inflation. His goals are educating children, buying more land, and hiring employees to help expand his business. Wilson needs the loan to buy land so as to expand his tea plantation.

loans.use: to buy land so as to expand his tea plantation

loans.name: Juma

texts.en: Juma is a married man living in Kasese, Uganda. His personal goal is to educate his children. He has been running a transportation business for the last 25 years, after getting capital from being an employed driver. His major hardships are price fluctuations, inflation, and high taxes. However, he has a goal of diversifying his business to include farming. The purpose of this loan is to buy a car for his transportation business.

loans.use: to buy a car for his transportation business

loans.name: Nafeesa

texts.en:
Nafeesa is 53 years old and comes from Al Aqaba, Jordan.

Nafeesa has a home-based project in which she is making dairy products and pickles for sale so she is requesting a loan of 500 JD.

Nafeesa is looking to opening a shop for her business with an aspiration of purchasing her own car.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients needed for making dairy products and pickles.

loans.name: Mchata Group

texts.en:
Dominica, who is in her early 40s, is married and has one child who has completed school.  Dominica has been running a food vending business for 10 years now.  She works from 6:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Dominica's fifth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to increase her food stocks and for household expenses, and she has paid back all her loans successfully.  She wants this loan to buy new utensils for her food business.  Her dream is to one day be able to build her own house.

She will share this loan with her loan group, Mchata, which has a total of 16 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy new utensils for her food business.

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en: Jackson is a 33-year-old married man with two children living in Kasese, Uganda. His personal goals are to educate his children and build a permanent home. He has been working as a coffee dealer for three years after starting with capital of 500,000 UGX. He has grown to 1,500,000 UGX only. His major hardships are price fluctuations, inflation and inadequate capital to purchase the required coffee. However, he has a goal of buying land and growing crops. The purpose of the loan is to buy coffee for resale.

loans.use: to buy coffee for resale

loans.name: John Jairo

texts.es: John Jairo es un señor que se ha caracterizado por buscar que sus 4 hijos y su esposa tengan la mejor calidad de vida posible. A sus 46 años, John Jairo se dedica a la talabartería, actividad que aprendió gracias a que ha sido trascendencia familiar. Sueña con que su negocio crezca y poder ofrecer mejores productos a sus clientes, por lo que actualmente requiere de la compra de insumos para aumentar la producción de su negocio. En busca de generar mayores ingresos, John Jairo quiere que sus clientes estén cada vez mas satisfechos con sus productos, por lo que quiere vender sus productos con mayor calidad.
texts.en: John Jairo is a man who has been characterized as seeking the best quality of life for his four children and wife. At 46 years old, John Jairo makes furniture, an activity he learned thanks to the family tradition. He dreams of growing his business and offering better products to his customers. To do this, he now needs to buy materials tom increase his business' production. Seeking more income, John Jairo wants his customers to be more satisfied with his products each time, so he wants to sell his products with higher quality.

loans.use: to buy materials for his business.

loans.name: Maria Limbany

texts.es: La señora Maria Limbany desde la muerte de su hermano se ha convertido en el apoyo económico para su madre. Además de sus 5 hijos, Maria Limbany ha tenido que luchar fuertemente para sacar toda su familia adelante, pues hace aproximadamente 9 meses murió su hermano, quién con su fábrica de arepas era el sostenimiento para su familia. Es por esto que junto con su madre, Maria Limbany quiere reabrir la fábrica de arepas que tenía su hermano que funcionaba desde su casa, pero para ello, requiere de la compra de algunos equipos necesarios para la producción de las arepas. Maria Limbany y su madre, sueñan con tener un gran negocio con bastante clientela, y que sean reconocidos por la calidad de sus productos.
texts.en: Since her brother's death, Maria Limbany has become her mother's source of financial support. Maria Limbany has five children and she has had to work hard to provide for her whole family because, approximately 9 months ago, her brother died. He had an 'arepa' factory and provided for the family. Together with her mother, Maria Limbany would like to re-open the arepa factory that her brother had at home. However, in order to do this, she needs to buy some necessary equipment for making arepas. Maria Limbany and her mother dream of having a large business with a lot of customers. They would like to be well known for the quality of their products.

loans.use: to buy production equipment

loans.name: Karina Dengse

texts.es:
Karina tiene 24 años de edad, ella vive en Imperial, Imperial está ubicado alrededor de una hora y media al sur de Lima, Imperial, con sus playas de arena, ruinas pre-incas, y la producción del adorado nacional licor de Perú, el Pisco (una especie de aguardiente de uva), ha sido durante mucho tiempo un destino turístico para los peruanos adinerados. Pero la verdadera Imperial  es una ciudad cálida y tranquila con una gran población afro-peruana, los restos de un camino indígena, y las influencias del imperio español. La ciudad, junto con otros cerca de la costa del Pacífico, fue dañado durante el 2001 y 2007 terremotos Perú, pero ha soportado como lo ha hecho durante gran parte de su historia. Karina ha estudiado hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, debido a que sus padres no tenían los medios económicos suficientes para solventar sus estudios, ella no pude seguir estudiando la carrera de derecho.

Karina vive en casa de sus padres,  a los que apoya con el fruto de su trabajo ya que ella nos dice que ellos a pesar de sus pocos recursos le han ayudado mucho, Karina se dedica a su negocio de venta de abarrotes en el mercado de su barrio, desde hace ya 7 meses los cuales ha dedicado mucho esfuerzo para salir adelante, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas diarias y puede llegar a atender 25 clientes por día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque brinda una buena atención a los clientes ya que le gusta que ellos regresen y la recomienden.

Actualmente está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que con la ayuda brindada ella podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio, con esta mejora podrá tener más variedad en los productos a ofrecer y con ello obtener mayores ingresos para así seguir ahorrando y ampliar su negocio y para lograr su más grande sueño: “Continuar sus estudios superiores”
texts.en:
Karina is 24 years old and lives in Imperial which is located about an hour and a half south of Lima. Imperial, with its sandy beaches, pre-Incan ruins and production of Peru's beloved national liquor, el Pisco (a type of liquor made from grapes), has long been a tourist destination for well-heeled Peruvians. But the true Imperial is a warm, peaceful city with a large Afro-Peruvian population, the result of an indigenous history and the influence of Spanish imperialism. The city, along with others near the Pacific coast, was damaged in the 2001 and 2007 earthquakes in Peru, but has born up as it has throughout most of its history. Karina has studied through the eleventh grade. Since her parents did not have enough economic resources to pay for her studies, she was not able to continue on to study the field of law. 

Karina lives in her parents' home, whom she supports with the fruits of her labor since she tells us that they, in spite of their few resources, have helped her greatly. Karina devotes herself to the business of selling groceries in her neighborhood market, which she has done for seven months now, devoting much effort to getting ahead. She works about eight hours a day and may serve up to 25 customers a day. She believes it is going well  in her business because she provides good customer service since she likes for the customers to return and recommend her to others. 

Currently she is very grateful to the Kiva lenders since with the help provided she will be able to purchase more merchandise for her business. With this improvement she will be able to have more variety in the products she sells and thus obtain a better income in order to continue saving. She hopes to expand her business and achieve her greatest dream: "To continue her advanced studies."

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es: Alexander, tiene la edad  de 32 años, está en unión libre y vive con sus hijo y su esposo que es son su mayor prioridad. El con el dinero pretende comprar ternero para el engorde. El actualmente cuenta con una área sembrada de pasto para la explotación de este proyecto por lo cual va invertir en la compra de estos animales. El tiene como meta que su ganado crezca y produzca para venderlos y obtener de el máximo de ganancias dándole así a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mayor estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Alexander is 32 years old.  He lives with his common-law wife and children, who are his main priority.  He plans to use his money to buy calves to fatten.  He currently has an area of land which is sown with pasture for this project.  He will now invest in buying animals.  Alexander's goal is to raise his cattle so that he can sell them and make maximum profits.  This will enable him to provide his family with a better quality of life and better financial stability.  This is the first loan that Alexander has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not received any previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered him this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy cattle for meat production

loans.name: Santos De Jesús

texts.es: Santos de Jesús de cincuenta y cuatro años de edad vive con su compañera de vida en casa propia. El se dedica al cultivo de maíz y adicional a eso tiene un transporte de alquiler, es muy conocido en la zona y es por eso que últimamente se ha aumentado la clientela, además lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y todo su negocio lo maneja con excelentes precios para las personas; Santos es un hombre muy dedicado a su trabajo, es muy activo y siempre se mantiene adelante de la competencia, piensa que hay que creer y esforzarse en las metas trazadas pues solo así se lográ el triunfo y él está muy dispuesto a creer, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, material de cultivo, etc. Santos de Jesús tiene fe que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Santos de Jesús is 54 years old and lives with his life partner in his own home.  His business is growing corn.  In addition to this, he also has a rental vehicle.  He is very well known in his area and, for this reason, his customer base has recently increased.  The produce that he sells is very good quality and he runs his business offering excellent prices to his customers.  Santos is a man who is very dedicated to his work.  He is very active and always keeps ahead of the competition.  His opinion is that you must believe in yourself and work hard towards achieving your goals as this is the only way to be successful.  Santos is very much ready to believe in himself and so he decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow him to buy corn, farming supplies, etc.  Santos believes that this will enable him to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn and farming supplies

loans.name: Dimas De Jesus

texts.es: El señor Dimas se dedica desde hace dos años a la venta de productos alimenticios en paquetes pequeños tales como canela, coco, miel, pasas y condimentos de manera ambulante ofreciendo tienda a tienda sus productos todos los días de 7:00 a.m a 5:00 p.m. A sus 40 años, el señor Dimas desea incrementar sus ventas, para lo cual necesita de la compra de surtido que le permita cumplir con su objetivo. El sueño del señor Dimas es tener su propio local para la venta de sus productos con el cual no tenga que salir a caminar día a día a buscar sus clientes y estar a la intemperie.
texts.en: For two years Señor Dimas has been hawking food in small packages, such as cinnamon, coconut, honey, raisins and spices, offering his products every day from 7 am to 5 pm. At the age of 40, he wants to boost his sales and therefore he needs to buy additional inventory in order to reach his goal. His dream is to have his own premises to sell his products. He wouldn't need any longer to walk through the streets to meet his customers and be exposed to wind and weather.

loans.use: to buy additional inventory, such as cinnamon, raisins, condiments, coconut and honey.

loans.name: Maritza Nohemy

texts.es: Maritza Nohemy de veintinueve años de edad vive con sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una venta de frutas y verduras en un puesto del mercado, cercano a la localidad donde reside últimamente ha aumentado su demanda, pues ella siempre tiene lo que el cliente necesita con productos de calidad, a precios accesibles además el servicio que ofrece es excelente ya que Maritza se caracteriza por ser muy amable; es una mujer muy trabajadora y le gusta estar adelante de su competencia, piensa que el mejor camino para llegar al triunfo es el de la perseverancia, y es el que ella ha elegido, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar plátanos, mandarinas, manzanas, tomates, cebollas, zanahorias etc. Maritza Nohemy tiene la confíanza que así logrará llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Maritza Nohemy, 29, lives with her children in her own home.  She has a fruit and vegetable stand in the market near her town. Lately she has noticed an increase in demand, mainly because she always has what customers are looking for such as quality and low prices.  Maritza also offers excellent service since she is very kind, a hard worker and likes to stay ahead of her competitors.  She believes the best way to success is through perseverence and that is the road she has chosen.  Therefore she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy bananas, tangerines, apples, tomatoes, onions, carrots, etc.  Maritza Nohemy trusts that she will be able to give her home economic stability this way.

loans.use: To buy bananas, tangerines, apples, tomatoes, onions and carrots.

loans.name: Norma Elizabeth

texts.es: Norma Elizabeth de treinta y seis años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una tienda donde vende toda clase de artículos, es muy conocida en la zona, debido a eso ha amentado la demanda en su negocio la gente la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de excelente calidad y a precios realmente cómodos; Norma es una mujer llena de metas por cumplir y una de ellas es ver crecer su negocio, para lograrlo su más grande secreto es el amor en su trabajo, está muy decidida a llegar al éxito, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, fruta, verdura, producto instantáneo, golosinas, aceites, huevos etc. Norma Elizabeth tiene fe que así podrá darle a su familia seguridad económica y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Norma Elizabeth is 38 years old and lives with her life companion and their children. She has a store where she sells all types of products. Norma is well-known in the area, which means that demand has increased for her business because people always prefer the excellent quality of products and affordable prices that she offers. She is a woman who has many goals to accomplish, one of them being to grow her business. In order to achieve this, she relies on her greatest secret which is to love her work.

Norma is very determined to be successful, so she has requested a loan from Apoyo Integral in order to buy basic grains, fruit, vegetables, instant products, candy, oil, eggs, and other items. She has faith that her family will have financial security and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, fruit, vegetables, instant products, candy, oil, eggs, and other items.

loans.name: Leandro

texts.es: Leandro, está casado y vive con su hijo y su esposo que es son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito pretende comprar cerdos para su posterior engorde y producción de carne. El  cuenta ya con la experiencia desarrollada para el buen manejo de su proyecto. El cuenta con las instalaciones ya y lo que quiere es ponerlas a funcionar  y sacarle provecho a sus locales. El tienen como meta tener los cerdos para tiempo de venta y poder venderlos a un muy buen precio para generar el máximo de las ganancias para mejorar su  bienestar familiar y su estabilidad económica.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Leandro is married and lives with his wife and child, who are his highest priority. He intends to use this loan to buy pigs that he will eventually fatten for producing meat. Leandro has already developed experience so that he can manage this project well. He has the facilities for this type of venture, so he wants to put them to good use. His goal is to have pigs to sell at a good price so that he can generate as much income as possible to improve his family’s well-being and to provide them with financial stability.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. Leandro has not received any prior loans from the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy pigs for fattening.

loans.name: Vilma Concepción

texts.es: Vilma Concepción vive con su compañero de vida en casa propia, ella posee una venta de refrescos y comida en el lugar de su residencia es muy conocida en la localidad y últimamente ha aumentado su demanda, ya que lo que comercia es de material de primera calidad y todo lo vende a precios realmente  accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable Vilma siempre está con una sonrisa en el rostro para todo el que la visita; Es una mujer muy trabajadora siempre dispuesta a salir adelante, ella piensa que cuando una mujer sabe lo que quiere y para donde va, el mundo entero se aparta para darle paso y Vilma sabe muy bien lo que quiere es por eso que está decidida a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas, azúcar, agua, granos básicos, carnes, verduras entre otros. Vilma Concepción tiene la esperanza que de esta forma logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Vilma Concepción lives in her own home with her life companion. She has a vending stand set up at her residence where she offers soft drinks and food. Vilma is well-known in her town and demand for her business has increased recently because the ingredients she uses are of the highest quality and everything she sells is offered at an affordable price. Her service is unequaled since she always has a smile on her face to welcome everyone who visits her. Vilma is a hardworking woman who is always willing to press forward. She believes that when a woman knows what she wants and where she is going, the whole world steps aside to make a path for her.

Vilma knows very well what she wants, so she has requested a loan from Apoyo Integral in order to buy fruits, sugar, water, basic grains, meats, vegetables, and other supplies. She is hopeful that she can provide her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fruits, sugar, water, basic grains, meats, vegetables, and other supplies.

loans.name: Jose Fernando

texts.es: A sus 50 años, el señor José Fernando se dedica a la producción de artículos de acero desde su taller adecuado en un pequeño local en un barrio del occidente de la ciudad de Medellín en el cual fabrica escaleras, pasamanos y camarotes en una jornada de lunes a viernes de 8:00 a.m a 5:00 p.m, gracias al conocimiento que su padre le brindo sobre esta labor. Con el fin de cumplir con varios pedidos, el señor José Fernando necesita de la compra de acero con el cual pueda entregar a sus clientes lo prometido. El sueño del señor José Fernando es ampliar su negocio y brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a su esposa y dos hijos.
texts.en:
At 50 years of age, Sr. José Fernando has been producing objects made of steel from his workshop set up in a small space in a neighborhood west of the city of Medellín. He produces stairs, handrails, and bunk beds Monday through Friday from 8am to 5pm. Thanks to the knowledge he obtained from his father, he is able to complete the work on various orders.

Sr. José Fernando needs to buy steel so that he can deliver the orders he promised to his customers. His dream is to expand his business and provide a better quality of life for his wife and two children.

loans.use: to buy steel.

loans.name: Ramón

texts.es:
El señor Ramón tiene 54 años de edad, esta casado con dos hijos.

Él se dedica a la agricultura, a la ganadería y al comercio de carne de cerdo, desde que era niño. Fue su papá quien le enseño esta actividad. Don Ramón manifiesta que la actividad que más le gusta por la demanda que tiene es la comercialización de carne de cerdo.

El señor Ramón, compra todo lo necesario para la producción en una ciudad que esta a tres kilómetros de su casa. Para transportar los productos a su casa, tiene que llevarlos en vehiculo o en autobús hasta la parada más cercana de su casa, luego él junto con sus hijas y sus nietos los cargan en la espalda hasta su vivienda. 

Él solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para pagar el alquiler de la tierra donde cultiva, ya que él no tiene suficiente espacio, además le servirá para pagarle a una persona  que le ayude junto con sus hijos. Así él tendrá más semilla para su consumo y si es posible para la venta.

Don Ramón, desea brindarle lo mejor a su familia, que sus hijos y nietos aprendan su trabajo, ya que a él le gustan mucho estas actividades que le ayudan a sobrevivir.
texts.en:
Señor Ramón, who is 54 years old, is married, with two children.

He works in farming, raising livestock, and selling pork, and has been doing this work since he was a child. It was his father who taught him this work. Don Ramón declares that the activity that he likes most, because of the demand for it, is selling pork.

Señor Ramon buys everything he needs for production in a city that is three kilometers from his house. To transport the products to his house, he has to carry them in a vehicle or bus to the stop that is closest to his house, then he and his children and grandchildren carry them on their backs to his home.

He is applying to Fundación Campo for a loan to pay to rent the land where he grows his crops, since he does not have sufficient space. It addition, it will serve to pay someone who will help him and his children. This way he will have more seeds for his use and, if possible, for sale.

Don Ramón wants to offer the best to his family and wants his children and grandchildren to learn his work, since he very much likes these activities, which help him to survive.

loans.use: to pay rent for the land where he grows his crops and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Hipolito

texts.es:
Hipólito de 40 años de edad casado con Justina de 38 años, fruto de esta relación tienen 6 hijos. Juntos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Sivia. Él agradece a la naturaleza porque gracias a ella, le rodea  su fuente de ingreso, él lleva casi la mitad de su vida dedicándose al cultivo de café, cacao y plátano al que le dedica su tiempo, esfuerzo y perseverancia.
En el trabajo siempre a contado con el apoyo de su amada Justina quien le lleva comida y vela por el bienestar de sus pequeños hijos. Pero cuando es temporada de cosecha, siempre requiere del apoyo de personal, quienes en tres días recolectan sus frutos, que serán llevados luego al mercado central para su venta. Hipólito esta contento con la buena producción de sus cultivos por que gracias a ello es su fuente de ingreso por el que desea continuar hasta que las fuerzas lo acompañen. Pero al margen de ello piensa tener una tienda de comestibles donde pueda laborar su esposa. Este es su primer credito con MFP, por lo que Hipólito se compromete en efectivizar el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles lo invertirá para contratar peones y puedan ayudar a cuidar de sus plantas y limpiar el terreno cultivado.
texts.en:
Hipólito, who is 40 years old, is married to Justina, who is 38. They have six children. They live together in their own house, located in the district of Sivia He is grateful to nature, because thanks to it, his source of income surrounds him. He has spent almost half his life working in the cultivation of coffee, cocoa, and bananas, to which he dedicates his time, effort, and perseverance.

In his work he always counts on the support of his loved one, Justina, who brings him food and watches out for the well-being of their little children. But when it is the harvest season, he always needs the help of some workers, who in three days harvest his crops, which will then be carried to the central market for sale. 

Hipólito is happy with the good production of his crops, because, thanks to it, it is his source of income, and he wants to continue this work as long as he has the strength. But in addition to this, he thinks about having a grocery store where his wife could work. 

This is his first loan with MFP, so Hipólito promises to make his payments. He will invest the 1000 PEN to hire workers, and they can take care of the plants and clean the cultivated land.

loans.use: to hire workers

loans.name: Reyna Maribel

texts.es:
La señora Reyna tiene 48 años de edad, vive con su esposo y con sus cuatro hijos de 16, 13, 10 y 8 años de edad cada uno.

Ella tiene 14 años de dedicarse a elaborar tamales de gallina, de elote y pisquez, todos los días. Trabaja 6 días a la semana y cada día vende como mínimo 200 tamales, pero no le son suficientes para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, ya que recientemente tiene como cliente a una funeraria que le realiza pedidos grandes. 

Por esta razón Reyna solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar papas, garbanzos, aceite, por mayor cantidades y un recipiente en donde pueda almacenar más cantidad de tamales, así ella no tendrá que viajar todos los días en la mañana a comprar los insumos que necesita como hasta hoy lo hace, ya que viaja dos veces al día a la ciudad: en la mañana a comprar los insumos, luego se regresa a su casa a elaborar los tamales y en la tarde vuelve a la ciudad a venderlos. 

Con el préstamo ella se ahorrara tiempo, que será utilizado en atender a sus hijos, ya que su esposo trabaja todo el día fuera de la casa en la albañilería. También dispondrá de suficiente insumos, para cubrir cualquier pedido, en cualquier momento, ya que muchas veces por falta de insumos no puede realizar algunos pedidos.

La señora Reyna, desea tener un puesto en la ciudad, para vender sus tamales y todo tipo de antojitos, para tener mayores ingresos y lograr que sus hijos estudien en la universidad.
texts.en:
Reyna is 48 years old and lives with her husband and their four children ages 16, 13, 10 and 8.

She has worked for 14 years making chicken, corn, and pisquez (bean) tamales everyday.  She works 6 days a week and each day she sells a minimum of 200 tamales, but that is not sufficient to satisfy the demand of her customers, since recently she acquired as a customer, a funeral home that makes large orders.

For this reason, Reyna is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo in order to purchase potatos, garbanzos (chick peas), and oil at wholesale quantities and a container in which she can store a greater quantity of tamales.  This way, she won't have to travel everyday in the morning to purchase the supplies that she needs like she has been doing up until now.  She travels twice a day to the city: in the morning to purchase supplies, then she returns home to make the tamales and in the afternoon, she goes back to the city to sell them.

With the loan, she will save time, which she will use to care for her children, since her husband works all day out of the home in the bricklaying business.  Also, she will have sufficient supplies readily available to fulfill any order, at any time, since many times, for lack of supplies, she isn't able to fill some orders.

Reyna would like to have a place in the city to sell her tamales and all types of snacks, in order to have a greater income and achieve a university education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase potatos, garbanzos (chick peas), and oil at wholesale quantities and a container in which she can store a greater quantity of tamales.

loans.name: Juana Gladis

texts.es:
La señora Juana tiene 37 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres hijos.

Ella se dedica a la venta de medicina natural desde hace 20 años, fue una amiga quien le enseño este negocio, ya que salían a vender juntas la medicina natural, poco a poco Juana fue aprendiendo y empezó su propio negocio.

La mercadería las adquiere en una ciudad del oriente del país, en diferentes lugares, ya que los compra donde le ofrecen mejores precios. La señora Juana, solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo para cancelar un crédito que posee con otra institución y el resto lo utilizara en la compra de más medicina natural. De esta manera ella tendría el crédito a una tasa de intereses más baja que la actual y surtirá su negocio, por lo que estaría obteniendo mayores utilidades.

La señora Juana, desea generar mayores ingresos para brindarles mejor alimentación a sus hijos y poco a poco abastecer su negocio de más mercadería y llegar a contratar a personas que le ayuden a vender por comisión y beneficiarse mutuamente.
texts.en:
Juana, 37, is a single mother of three children.  She has been selling natural remedies for 20 years.  A girlfriend taught her this business since they used to go out selling natural remedies together.  Gradually, Juana learned and started her own business.

She gets her merchandise in a city in the east of the country, in various places, since she buys them where she gets the best prices.  Juana is asking Fundación Campo for a loan to pay off a loan she has with another institution and will use the rest of it to buy more natural remedies.  This way she’ll have a loan with a lower interest rate and will stock her business which will lead to higher profits.

Juana wants to earn higher income to provide better nourishment for her children and to gradually stock her business with more merchandise and eventually hire people to help her sell on commission to their mutual benefit.

loans.use: to pay off a loan she has with another institution and the rest to buy more natural remdies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy books, notebooks, paper and pencils.

loans.name: Rosalba De Jesus

texts.es: La señora Rosalba de Jesus ha sido una mujer luchadora que ha tenido que trabajar fuertemente con su esposo para sacar sus 6 hijos adelante. Víctima de la violencia, la señora Rosalba de Jesús es una desplazada mas que tuvo que abandonar su municipio para hospedarse en el municipio de Bello, al norte de la ciudad de Medellín. Desde allí ha podido sacar su familia adelante gracias a que con su esposo consiguieron un puesto de comidas en su barrio donde trabajan todos los días en largas jornadas. Con el ánimo de incrementar sus ventas y ofrecer productos diferentes a sus clientes, la señora Rosalba busca comprar un carro de comidas rápidas para añadirles la oferta a sus clientes.
texts.en: Rosalba de Jesús has been a tenacious woman who has had to work hard with her husband to raise their six children.  A victim of violence, Rosalba de Jesús is a displaced person; she had to abandon her town to reside in the town of Bello north of the city of Medellín.  From there she’s been able to move her family ahead thanks to the fact that she and her husband were able to secure a food stand in the neighborhood where they work long, daily work days.  With the aim of increasing sales and offering different items to their customers, Rosalba wants to buy a fast food cart to add to her customer offerings.

loans.use: to buy a fast food cart.

loans.name: Jose Uriel

texts.es: Con dos años de experiencia, el señor José Uriel se dedica a la venta de dulces y mangos a las afueras de un colegio del norte de la ciudad de Medellín, actividad que surgió de la necesidad de conseguir los ingresos necesarios para su sostenimiento y el de su esposa luego de quedarse sin empleo. A sus 59 años, el señor José Uriel necesita de la compra de surtido en mangos y dulces que pueda vender y así mejorar sus ventas. El sueño del señor José Uriel es tener su propia tienda en la cual poder emplear jóvenes de su comunidad.
texts.en: Mr. José Uriel has two years' experience selling sweets and mangos outside a school on the northside of the city of Medellín.  His business arose out of a need to obtain enough income to support himself and his wife when he lost his job.  At age 59, José Uriel needs to buy a variety of mangos and sweets to improve sales.  His dream is to have his own store and employ youth in his community.

loans.use: To buy a variety of mangos and sweets.

loans.name: Deciderio

texts.es: Deciderio de 42 años está casado con Teodora de 40 años, fruto de esta relación tienen 2 hijos con los que viven en su casa propia ubicada en el centro poblado de Chuvivana del distrito de Sivia. Él es un agricultor de buena trayectoria que ya viene dedicándose por lo menos 7 años atrás cultivando cacao y café, productos que en estos últimos años dejan muy buena retabilidad en su comercialización y más en el mercado exterior, es por ello que los pecios de éste producto se han elevado. Gracias al empeño en el trabajo y el apoyo que tiene de su querida esposa son las ganancias que ahora ellos disfrutan. Deciderio tiene una visión a futuro, pues sabe que la fuerza física ya le va ir abandonando poco apoco a medida que su edad avanza, por tal razón desea habilitar su vivienda para una tienda de abarrotes. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por el que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente este segundo credito. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles invertirá en la mejora de su campo agrícola, para ello contratará peones.
texts.en: Deciderio, 42, is married to Teodora, 40, and they have two children and live in their own house located in the central village of Chuvivana in the district of Sivia.  He is a farmer with a good business who, for at least seven years, has been growing cocoa and coffee.  Both products have been very profitable over the last few years, especially in the overseas markets.  This is why prices have increased.  Thanks to his hard work and support from his loving wife, they now can enjoy the profits they have earned.  With the future in mind, Deciderio knows that his physical strength will abandon him at some point as he ages, so he wants to set up a grocery store in his home.  This is his second loan through MFP and he is committed to paying it back on time.  He plans to use the 3,000 PEN loan to improve his farmland and hire workers.

loans.use: To hire workers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy coffee, energy products and other items.

loans.name: Arlette

texts.es: Arlette, tiene la edad de 34 años está casada y vive con su hijo y sus padres que son su mayor prioridad. Ella con el crédito quiere compara los alimentos para el engorde de estos animales y compra de pollos pequeños para engordarlos. Ella cuenta con el local en buenas condiciones para desarrollar el proyecto y conoce del manejo de estos animales por lo cual quiere invertir en el proyecto. Ella tiene como meta vender sus animales en un tiempo bueno y así generar el máximo de las ganancias para su bienestar familiar y estabilidad económica para su futuro. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Arlette, 34, is married and lives with her children and parents who are her first priority.  She wants to use the loan to buy feed for the young chickens she will raise.  She has adequate space to carry out her project and she is familiar with the poultry business.  Her goal is to sell the animals is a short amount of time and generate a good income for her family's well-being and economic stability.  This is her first loan through FUDECOSUR.  She has never received a state bank loan but FUDECOSUR is offering a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy chickens to feed.

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es: Teodoro de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. El posee una llantería donde vende y repara, es muy famoso en el lugar y últimamente se ha hecho de mas clientela pues el producto que comercia y su trabajo son de muy buena calidad, además que los precios son realmente accesibles; Teodoro es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante y cumplir todos sus sueños, uno de ellos es ver crecer su negocio para mantenerse siempre adelante de la competencia, sus más grandes secretos para llegar al éxito son la fuerza y la voluntad de convertirse en un triunfador , con ese pensamiento es que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar llantas por mayor. Teodoro tiene fe que con su duro trabajo podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Teodoro is 48, and lives with his life partner and their children in their own house. He has a tire shop, where he sells and repairs. He is very well-known locally, and lately, he has gotten more customers, as the product her sells, and his work, are of very good quality. In addition, the prices are really affordable.

Teodoro is an enterprising man, who is eager to get ahead, and fulfill all his dreams. One of them is to see his business grow, so that he always stays ahead of the competition. 

His greatest secrets for attaining success are hard work and the will to become a winner. With that thought, he decided to apply to Integral for a loan that allows him to buy tires at wholesale. Teodoro has faith that with his hard work, he will be able to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy tires at wholesale.

loans.name: Nilton Carlos

texts.es:
Nilton de 41 años, es un hombre soltero, que trabaja como Zapatero, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace ya algún tiempo,  Aunque le hubiese gustado ser mecánico de avión, en la actualidad disfruta mucho de su trabajo, es tanto así que lo ha llegado a considerar como su pasatiempo personal, Nilton vive en Ica, ciudad caracterizada actualmente por el incremento de inversión, no solo en la agro exportaciones, es decir en los fundos, si no también, en la apertura de nuevos centros comerciales que brindan muchos puestos de trabajo a pobladores iqueños. 

Todos los días el se dedica a trabajar durante 12 horas diarias, en este lapso del tiempo, él puede satisfacer los pedidos de aproximadamente 10 clientes, lo que le permite tener un ingreso de S/.50. Él considera que su negocio tiene esta gran acogida por que cobra lo justo y necesario a sus clientes, siempre está pendiente también de brindar un buen servicio, para que sus clientes regresen y lo recomienden con sus conocidos.

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, él podrá comprar sandalias para poder venderlas, gracias a su perspectiva y visión de negocio, confía que con este nuevo producto podrá lograr incrementar sus ingresos continuamente y así es como quiere lograr tener un reconocimiento especial por la diversidad de su trabajo. Él sabe que una manera de siempre lograr y tener mejores ingresos es logrando crear nuevos y pequeños negocios, en esta oportunidad él se ha trazado como meta poder comprarse una moto taxi.
texts.en:
Nilton is 41, single, and works as a shoemaker. He has been doing this work for some time. Although he would have liked to be an aircraft mechanic, he now enjoys his work very much; so much so, that he has come to consider it a personal hobby. 

Nilton lives in Ica, a city currently characterized by increased investment, not only in agricultural exports; that is to say, financing of these, but also by the opening of new retail centers which offer a lot of jobs to people who live in Ica.

He works 12 hours a day, every day. In this period of time he can accommodate orders from approximately 10 customers, which allows him to have an income of 50 soles. He considers that his business has had this great reception, because he charges his cusomers what is fair and necessary. He is also always looking to provide a good service, so that his customers return, and recommend him to people they know.  

With the help of the Kiva lenders, he will be able to buy sandals to sell. Because of his outlook and vision for his business, he is confident that with this new product he will be able to succeed in steadily increasing his income. This is how he wishes to gain special acknowledgement for the variety of his work. 

He knows that one way to get ahead and have better income, is by managing to create new small businesses. On this occasion, he has set himself the goal of being able to buy a mototaxi.

loans.use: To buy sandals to sell.

loans.name: Luz Elena

texts.es: La señora Luz Elena esta dedicada desde hace aproximadamente 15 años a la confección de prendas de vestir sobre medida y por encargo en un pequeño taller adecuado en su casa, trabaja en una jornada de todos los días desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m. Gracias a esta actividad ha podido generar los ingresos necesarios para su sustento y el de sus padres. A sus 50 años, la señora Luz Elena desea de la compra de insumos tales como telas e hilos con los cuales pueda producir camisas de dama para vender a sus familiares y conocidos y poder mejorar sus ventas. El sueño de la señora Luz Elena es tener un taller de confección bien amplio en el cual pueda generar varios empleos directos.
texts.en:
Luz Elena has been making made-to-measure and custom clothing for approximately 15 years. She is 50 years old. She has a small, adequate workshop in her house, and works every day from 8:00am until 6:00pm. 

Thanks to this business, she has been able to generate the income necessary to support herself and her parents. Luz Elena wishes to buy supplies such as fabric and thread, to use for making women's shirts to sell to family members and to people she knows, and to be able to improve her sales. 

Luz Elena's dream is to have a really spacious dressmaking workshop, through which she can generate several direct jobs.

loans.use: To buy sewing supplies, such as fabric, thread, and trimming.

loans.name: Argemiro

texts.es: El señor Argemiro desde hace 20 años esta dedicado a la cerrajería, actividad con la cual genera los ingresos necesarios para el sustento de su esposa y sus dos hijos. Argemiro se ha caracterizado por ser un hombre pujante con ganas de sacar su familia adelante y es por esto que siempre busca que su negocio este creciendo. Brindarle una buena educación a sus 2 hijos es el sueño de Argemiro, y sabe que para poder lograrlo, necesita ofrecer mejores productos y con mayor calidad a sus clientes.
texts.en: Argemiro has been working as a metal worker for twenty years, an activity that generates the necessary income to support his wife and two children.  Argemiro is notable for being a dedicated man who very much wants to move his family forward and this is why he’s always looking to advance his business.  His dream is to provide his two children with a good education and knows that to do so he needs to offer better, higher quality products to his customers.

loans.use: to buy supplies and hand tools.

loans.name: Diomedes

texts.es: Diomedes, de 45 años de edad casado con Adrigvia de 35 años,  fruto de esta relación tienen 3 hermosos hijos con los que viven en su casa propia. Ubicado en el centro poblado de Chuvivana, del distrito de Sivia. Él es  agricultor, desde muy joven aprendió ésta labor de sus padres, quienes fueron los que lo impulsaron y apoyaron cuando el recién empezaba a sembrar. Durante ese tiempo tuvo un fuerte accidente donde se fracturó las dos piernas  por lo que estuvo en cama durante medio año, mientras tanto no había quien pueda laborar en su cultivo, su querida esposa sola trataba de realizar los trabajos pero las plantas crecen rápidamente y se hacia frondosa por lo que era difícil de cultivar. A pesar de todo ello, Diomedes recuperado de sus dolencias empezó nuevamente a cultivar sus plantaciones de café y plátano. Generalmente trabaja juntamente con su querida esposa quien es su fiel compañera de toda la vida, pro tanto en un futuro piensan abrir un nuevo negocio que es la venta de prendas de vestir para niños. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles invertirá en el mantenimiento de su parcela de café, contrantando peones y comprando abono.
texts.en:
Diomedes, 45, is married to Adrigvia, 35, and they have three beautiful children that they live with in their own house located in the town of Chuvivana in Sivia District.  He’s a farmer who learned to farm from his parents when he was still a boy; they pushed him and supported him when he was just starting out planting.  During that time, he suffered a serious accident fracturing both legs and was bedridden for half a year.  During that time he was unable to work.  His beloved wife tried to do the work by herself but the plants grow quickly becoming very lush and difficult to cultivate.  Despite all that, once Diomedes recovered from his ills, he once again started to cultivate his coffee and banana plants.  He usually works alongside his beloved wife who has been his faithful companion all his life.  In the future, they plan to open a new business which is selling children’s clothes.
This is his second MFP loan and he pledges to pay his installments punctually.  He will use the 3000 new soles to maintain his coffee fields hiring day laborers and buying manure.

loans.use: to hire day laborers and to buy manure.

loans.name: Mariela De Jesus

texts.es: A sus 39 años de edad, la señora Mariela es madre de 5 hijos de 23, 17, 15, 9 años y un bebe de 14 meses de nacido, con el ánimo de brindar a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida, día a día la señora Mariela se dedica a la compra, engorde y venta de pollos en un pequeño lugar adecuado en el patio de su casa. Esta actividad la aprendió de su madre quien le brindo todo el conocimiento necesario para desempeñarse en esta labor. Con el ánimo de mejorar sus ventas e ingresos, la señora Mariela necesita de la compra de pollos con los cuales pueda seguir con su negocio y cumplir su sueño de ampliar su negocio y brindar un mejor bienestar a su familia.
texts.en: At the age of 39, Mariela is the mother of five children who are 23, 17, 15 and 9 years old and a 14-month-old baby.  With the aim of providing her children with a good quality of life, Mariela buys chicks to sell that she raises in a small space she set aside in her yard to do so.  She learned this activity from her mother who taught her everything needed to develop in this activity.  Aiming to improve sales and income, Mariela needs to buy chicks to stay in business and reach her dream of expanding it and provide better wellbeing for her family.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.es: Elisa, de 29 años de edad casado con Abad 30 años, fruto de esta relación tuvieron un hijo, con el que ahora viven en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Chuvivana del distrito de Sivia. Elisa, es una mujer de buenos principios gracias a las enseñanzas de su querida madre, quien es una persona de bien. Eliza ahora es mamá y está ligada al mismo tiempo al trabajo en el campo, juntamente con su querido esposo. Pues además de hacer las labores domesticas termina su día labrando y cultivando café, con la finalidad de obtener mejores ingresos para así brindarle a su familia un bienestar económico. Es así que empezó a dedicarse a esta labor  gracias al incentivo de sus padres, y ahora más por el bienestar de su pequeño hijo, porque es una gran oportunidad como para poder sobresalir de la pobreza que les aqueja. En un futuro próximo desea emprender nuevos retos como el de tener su negocio juntando el capital de las cosechas de su producto mas el credito de MFP, para montar una tienda de abarrotes. Este será su segundo credito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Eliza agradece a los integrantes de su banco comunal por la buena gestión que vienen realizando. En la navidad piensan degustar un rico chocolate de confraternidad. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles realizará el deshierbo de maleza que crece en su su campo agrícola, para ello contratará peones.
texts.en:
Elisa, 29, is married to Abad, 30; they have a son that lives with them in their own house located in the community of Chuvivana in Sivia district.  She is a woman with good principles thanks to her mother’s teaching who is an upstanding citizen.

Elisa is now a mother too and bound to working in the fields alongside her beloved husband.  Besides doing her domestic chores, she finishes her day working in the fields growing coffee hoping to earn better income to provide her family with economic wellbeing.  This is what led her to start working in this field thanks to the encouragement from her parents and now for her little boy’s wellbeing because it’s a great opportunity to get out of the poverty that afflicts them.  In the near future she wants to face new challenges like having a business of her own; she wants to add profits from her crop sales to her MFP loan to set up a grocery store.

This will be her second MFP loan and she commits to make her installment payments punctually.  Elisa thanks her communal bank members for the good work they’ve been doing.  They plan to enjoy delicious chocolate during Christmas as a sign of togetherness.

She will use the 2000 new soles to weed her fields and to do so will hire day laborers.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: María Ángela

texts.es: María Ángela de sesenta años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee un taller de costura en el lugar de su residencia, confecciona todo tipo de prendas vestidos, camisas, pantalones entre otros, últimamente se ha hecho de mas clientela pues su trabajo es excelente, con materia prima de primera calidad y con precios accesibles además el servicio es incomparable María siempre es muy amable con las personas q la visitan; Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y activa le gusta salir adelante de la competencia, quiere cumplir cada uno de sus propósitos a futuro y su más grande secreto es la paciencia y el amor que le pone a la labor, quiere ver crecer el negocio y es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor . María Ángela tiene la confianza que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Ángela, 70, lives with her domestic partner and their children in a house of their own. She has a sewing workshop in her house where she makes all kinds of clothing, such as dresses, shirts and trousers, among others.

Recently she has acquired more and more customers because she does an excellent work, with high quality raw materials and at affordable prices, and also because she offers a service that is second to none.

María is always very kind to visitors; she is a hard-working, active woman who likes to stand out from her competitors. She wishes to reach each one of her long-term goals, and her biggest secret is the great amount of patience and love she puts into her business. 

She wants to see her business grow and so asks INTEGRAL for a loan which allows her to buy fabric from wholesalers. María Ángela is confident this way she will be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy fabric from wholesalers.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio Cesar es una persona luchadora que siempre ha querido ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida a sus padres, es por esto que se encuentra en la búsqueda de poder generar mayores ingresos para su hogar y de esta manera lograr que sus ingresos no solo dependan de su empleo. Gracias a que anteriormente ha conocido la actividad de la ganadería, Julio Cesar desea invertir en unas especies que le permitan tener una seguridad económica ya que su empleo es muy inestable. El sueño de Julio Cesar es poder ahorrar dinero para estudiar una carrera universitaria y así mejorarles la calidad de vida a sus padres.
texts.en: Julio Cesar is a tenacious person who has always wanted to provide the best possible quality of life for his parents.  For this reason, he's been seeking a way to generate more income for the household, and in this way ensure that his income is not only dependent upon what he earns as an employee.  Since he previously had learned about animal husbandry, Julio Cesar wants to invest in some animals so that he can have economic stability, since his job is very unstable.  Julio Cesar's dream is to be able to save enough money to earn a university degree, and in this way improve the quality of life for his parents.

loans.use: to buy livestock to raise

loans.name: Melissa Alejandra

texts.es: A sus 19 años, la joven Melissa es madre soltera de un bebé de 1 año de nacido, con el fin de brindarle a su hijo todo lo necesario, decide desde hace un año dedicarse a la venta de ropa y al peinado de niñas. Desde entonces, todos los días, la joven Melissa sale a las calles a vender su mercancía y conseguir sus ingresos. Con el ánimo de suplir las necesidades propias y de su hijo, la joven Melissa necesita de la compra de mercancía que puede ofrecer a sus clientes y a futuro cumplir su sueño de tener su propio almacén y ver crecer a su hijo en buenas condiciones.
texts.en: At 19, young Melissa is the single mother of a 1 year-old baby.  A year ago, with the objective of providing her child with everything he needs, she decided to start a business selling clothing and hairstyling for little girls. Since then, each day, young Melissa goes out into the streets to sell her merchandise and obtain her income.  With the motive of meeting her own needs and those of her son, young Melissa needs to buy merchandise to offer to her customers.  In the future, she hopes to accomplish her dream of having her own store and seeing her child grow up in good living conditions.

loans.use: to buy clothing for men and women

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es: Silvia de 33 años de edad es la propietaria de una miscelánea, donde  además de vender mercancías variadas, como accesorios, papelería, ropa etc., también ofrece el servicio de llamadas a celulares, aprovechando la clientela que diariamente le compra. Así ha logrado generar ingresos para apoyar el bienestar de hogar,  conformado por su cónyuge y sus  dos hijos en las edades de 14 y 15 años. Desde el año 2006 inició su negocio, vendiendo mercancía en pocas cantidades, luego agregó dos líneas a celulares, posteriormente dos vitrinas y poco ha poco ha ido logrando un buen surtido en su negocio. En la actualidad exhibe sus vitrinas en la puerta de su casa y sus hijos la ayudan. Su sueño es mejorar las condiciones habitacionales y lograr brindarles una educación exitosa a sus hijos,  para que puedan ser prósperos. En su negocio vende a crédito y principalmente de contado; su gran desafío diario es lograr ventas importantes, pero sobre todo que sus clientes regresen y sean fieles. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva, con el cual comprará ropa, juguetería respondiendo así a los pedidos de sus clientes, que se alistan para tener en familias una navidad y un recibimiento de año muy felices y muy bien vestidos.
texts.en:
33 year old Silvia is the owner of a general store, where as well as selling various merchandise, like accessories, stationary, clothes etc., as well as offering a service of calls to cell phones, making the most of the clients that buy it every day. 

In this way she has managed to generate income to support the well-being of her family, made up of her spouse and two children aged 14 and 15. She started her business in 2006, selling small quantities of merchandise, next added to cellphone lines, then display cases and little by little she has been obtaining a good range for her business. Currently, she exhibits her display cases in the doorway of her house and her children help her. 

Her dream is to improve their living conditions and be able to provide a successful education for her children, so that they can prosper. 

In her business, she sells on credit and mainly cash sales; her main challenge is obtaining important sales, but above all that her clients come back and are loyal. 

Currently she is applying for her first kiva loan, with which she will buy clothes and toys in response to her clients requests, as they are preparing to have a  very happy and well dressed Christmas and New Year celebration with their families.

loans.use: to buy clothes and toys in response to her client's requests.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo, tiene la edad de 34 años, está casado y vive con su hijo y su esposa que son mayor prioridad. El con el crédito pretende comprar los insumos como abonos y químicos para tener su cafetal en óptimas condiciones. El tienen como meta tener su cultivo en óptimas condiciones para así esta próxima cosecha aumentar la producción de café y tener un mejor rendimiento de producción. El tienen como meta que su mejora al cultivo de los mejores resultados de producción y así tener más ganancias y mejorar su bienestar familiar.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Gerardo, 34 years old, is married and lives with his son and his wife, who are his number one priority. 

With the loan he intends to buy supplies like manure and chemicals to keep his coffee plantation in optimum condition. 

His goal is to keep his crops in the best condition so that the next harvest will have a greater production of coffee and an improved production output. His goal is that the improved crop with better production results will give him more income and improve his family's well-being. 

This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He wouldn't have had other loans from state banks before, but FUDECOSUR has given him the loan with greater facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to attend to his coffee.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: La señora Luz Marina ha trabajado fuertemente con el ánimo de sacar su hijo adelante. Ya que es madre soltera, siempre se ha buscado la manera de generar ingresos para su hogar para poder pagar los gastos personales y los de su hijo. Desde hace 12 años trabaja como peluquera en su municipio, y desde hace 3 montó su propia sala de belleza, y gracias a esto sus trabajos se han podido posicionar y reconocer mas que antes. Luz Marina sueña con que su negocio crezca y que cada vez sus clientes la reconozcan mas por la calidad de su trabajo, así podrá generar mayores ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su hijo.
texts.en:
Luz Marina has worked hard with the goal of getting her son ahead.  Now that she is a single mother she is always looking for ways to generate income for her home so that she can cover personal expenses as well as those of her son.  She has worked as a beautician for the past 12 years in her town and 3 years ago she opened a beauty shop.  Thanks to this business she has been able to get herself positioned and well-known and earn more than before.
Her dream is that her business grows and that her customers recognize her for the quality of her work. That way she will have more earnings and improve the quality of life for her son.

loans.use: to buy equipment for her beauty salon as well as do some remodeling

loans.name: Josser

texts.es: Josser, tiene la edad de 19 años, está soltero y vive con sus padres y hermanos. El con el crédito pretende comprar los insumos como abonos y químicos para tener su cafetal en óptimas condiciones. El cuenta con un área ya sembrada de cafetal y  lo que quiere es mejorarlo para así generar este próximo año de cosecha un mejor rendimiento en producción. El tienen como meta generar el máximo de las ganancias para salir con el crédito y mejorar su estabilidad económica y su bienestar familiar cada día. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Josser, 19, is single and lives with his parents and siblings.  With this loan, he plans to buy supplies such as manure and chemicals to get his coffee crops in optimal condition.  He has some land that is already planted with coffee, and what he needs to do is to improve it so that his next harvest will give him a greater crop yield.  His goal is to generate maximum earnings so that he can pay off the loan and improve his economic stability and the well-being of his family.  This is the first loan that he has received through FUDECOSUR.  He has not taken other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him with a loan with better payment terms and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to improve his coffee crops

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es: El señor Rigoberto se encuentra dedicado a la mecánica, actividad con la que genera el sustento necesario para su esposa y sus dos hijos. Gracias a que esta ubicado en la autopista a la entrada de su municipio, Rigoberto cuenta con una buena clientela que le genera al menos los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Debido a que no cuenta con un taller totalmente equipado, a Rigoberto se le escapa la oportunidad de atender a mayor cantidad de clientes en su taller. El sueño de Rigoberto es poder aumentar los empleados en su taller de modo que pueda ayudar a personas mas necesitadas y también poder brindarles a sus hijos la educación que necesitan.
texts.en: Rigoberto works as a mechanic, and with this activity he generates the income needed to support his wife and their two children.  Rigoberto has a lot of customers, due to the fact that his business is located on the highway at the entrance to his town, and so his business generates the income he needs for his household.  Since his workshop is not fully equipped, Rigoberto misses the opportunity to serve more customers in his shop.  Rigoberto's dream is to be able to increase the number of employees in his workshop so that he could help out some needy people and also be able to provide his children with the education that they need.

loans.use: to buy welding equipment

loans.name: Omaira De Jesus

texts.es: La señora Omaira a sus 41 años de edad se dedica a la confección en su propio taller ubicado en la sala de su casa en el cual le ayudan dos de sus hijas y una sobrina desde hace 7 años cuando inicio con su negocio con el ánimo de mejorar sus ingresos y la calidad de vida de su familia. Actualmente, la señora Omaira necesita de la compra de insumos tales como hilos y cierres con lo cual pueda confección una nueva línea de ropa que desea ofertar a sus clientes quienes la distinguen por su calidad y buenos precios. El sueño de la señora Omaira es ampliar su taller de confecciones y poder emplear a más de sus familiares.
texts.en:
Omaira is 41 years old and makes a living making clothing in her own workshop located in the living room of her home. Two of her daughters and one niece have helped her since she started the business seven years ago with the desire to improve her income and her family's quality of life. 

Right now, Omaira needs to buy supplies such as thread and zippers with which she can make a new clothing line. She wants to put the line on a special offer to her customers who single her out for her quality and good prices. 

Omaira's dream is to expand her clothing workshop and be able to employ more of her family members.

loans.use: to buy supplies like thread and zippers.

loans.name: Yarley Emilse

texts.es: Yarley vive en el municipio de Puerto Colombia con su cónyuge y su hijo de 4 años de edad. Allí tiene un negocio a través del cual vende mercancía a crédito, mediante el sistema de distribución a clientes que hacen sus pedidos y que hacen parte de su base de compradores fieles. Yarley aunque terminó sus estudios de enfermería no ejerce su profesión, por eso desde hace 4 años decidió emprender su propia aventura de negocios empezando por la venta de ropa y gradualmente agregándole calzado, útiles escolares, electrodomésticos menores y cualquier producto que le encarguen. La mayoría de sus clientes son conductores de la ruta, que de la ciudad de Barranquilla llega a Puerto Colombia, un municipio ubicado a orillas del mar y esta es justamente su principal clientela, porque su esposo es también conductor y estos le pagan diariamente a plazos pactados, que no exceden de 60 días. Ella vende en su negocio, desde un par de zapatos hasta llantas para buses,. Adicionalmente también tiene un kiosco a la entrada de la estación de buses donde vende refrescos, bebidas y pasabocas. En l actualidad planea responder a su clientela en la época de mayor movimiento comercial del año y necesita estar muy bien surtida de mercancías. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará ropa, calzado, útiles escolares electrodomésticos menores entre otros.  Su inversión será exitosa, porque la realizará de contado, adquiriendo descuentos y fundamentada en pedidos de sus mejores clientes.
texts.en:
Yarley lives in the Puerto Colombia municipality with her partner and 4 year old son. She has a business there through which she sells merchandise on credit, by means of a distribution system to clients who place orders and form part of her loyal customer base. 

Although Yarley studied to be a nurse, she doesn't work in this profession, Because of this, four years ago she decided to embark on her own business adventure. She began by selling clothes and gradually added shoes, school supplies, small household electrical items and whatever product is ordered. The majority of her clients are bus drivers on the road from the city of Barranquilla to Puerto Colombia, a municipality found at the mouth of the sea. This is her main clientèle, because her husband is also a bus driver, and they pay her daily in agreed amounts for no more than 60 days. 

She sells a variety of products, from a pair of shoes to wheels for buses. In addition, she also has a kiosk at the entrance to the bus station, where she sells soft drinks and tasty snacks. 

Currently, she plans to respond to her client in the season of the greatest amount of commercial movement of the year, by being well stocked with merchandise. This is the reason she has come for a kiva loan, her first funding from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will buy clothes, footwear, school supplies and small household electrical items, among other things.

Her investment will be successful because she will make it work, getting discounts and basing it on the demands of her best customers.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, school equipment and small electrical household applicances, among other things

loans.name: Comfort

texts.en:
Comfort lives at Nkrontrodo with 6 dependents and her husband, who is a driver. Comfort sells soft drinks, maize, groundnuts, and beans. She has done this for some time now. She uses her income to support her husband to feed and clothe their children.

Comfort will use her loan to purchase more soft drinks, maize, groundnuts, and beans for sale. With the new profit, she will expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more soft drinks, maize, groundnuts, and beans for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more footware (sandals) and materials for resale.

loans.name: Mary Eva

texts.en:
Mary Eva is a single parent. She lives at Nkrontrodo, near Elmina, with her 3 children. Mary sells ladies' dresses, chemicals for agriculture, and credit transfers for mobile phone.

As a single parent, Mary Eva uses her income for the general upkeep of her children. Mary will use her loan to purchase more ladies' dresses, chemicals, and unite transfers for sale. With the new profit she will expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more ladie's dresses, chemicals for agriculture, and mobile phone credit transfers for sale.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en:
Efua is divorced and has one child. For some years now she has sold charcoal at Nkontrodo near Elmina. She uses her income to pay for her children’s school fees.

Efua will use her loan to purchase bags of charcoal to sell. With her anticipated profits, she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is a single parent with one child. For some years now she has sold cloth in Nkrontrodo near Elmina. She uses her income to feed and clothe herself and her child, and pay her rent.

Patricia will use her loan of 400 GHS to purchase more cloth to sell. With her profits, she plans to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase more cloth to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more soft drinks, eggs and bread to sell.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en:
Efua is married to a driver and has four children. operates a grocery shop. The family lives together in Nkrontrodo, near Elmina.

Efua has been running a grocery shop for some years now. She uses her income to help her husband in paying their children’s school fees.

Efua needs this loan of 600 GHS to enable her to stock a variety of groceries to satisfy her customers. With all additional profits, she will grow her business.

loans.use: to stock a variety of groceries to satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: La señora Margarita ha sido una persona luchadora que ha sacado adelante su familia. Con 66 años, Margarita se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir, actividad con la que ha podido sostener los gastos del hogar donde convive con su esposo y su hijo. Margarita siempre ha trabajado en la confección y desde hace un tiempo montó su propio taller de confección y empezó a vender sus propios productos. Gracias a esto, Margarita ha podido mejorar la calidad de vida de su hijo y su esposo, sin embargo, Margarita sueña con que su negocio siga creciendo, siga siendo reconocido por sus buenos trabajos y por su buena calidad.
texts.en:
Margarita is a hard-working person who has supported her family. At 66 years old, Margarita makes clothing, an activity through which she has been able to pay the expenses of the household in which she lives with her husband and her son.

Margarita has always worked in dressmaking, and has recently set up her own dressmaking workshop and started to sell her own products. Thanks to this, Margarita has been able to improve the quality of the lives of her son and husband. However, Margarita dreams that her business will continue growing and continue being recognised for her good work and its good quality.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her dressmaking workshop.

loans.name: Lucelly

texts.es: La señora Lucelly ha sido una trabajadora toda su vida para sacar adelante su familia. Lastimosamente su esposo la dejó, por lo que hoy es una madre soltera cabeza de familia. La inspiración de Lucelly es su hija de 28 años, que sufre de parálisis cerebral y por la que cada día tiene que trabajar arduamente, pues no posee apoyo de ninguna otra persona. Lucelly tiene a su tienda como la alternativa para generar los ingresos de su hogar, por lo que siempre sueña con poder incrementar sus ventas y hacer su tienda atractiva para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Lucelly has been a hard-worker all of her life in order to get her family ahead. Unfortunately, her husband left her.  Therefore she is now a single mother and the head of the family.

Lucelly’s 28 year old daughter, who suffers from cerebral palsy, is her inspiration.  Lucelly has to work arduously every day for her because she does not have help from anyone else.

Lucelly chose her store as the way to generate income for her household.  She always dreams of being able to increase her sales and of making her store attractive to her customers.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Omaira

texts.es: La señora Omaira se ha caracterizado por querer hacer las cosas de la mejor manera. A sus 34 años, Omaira se encuentra manejando la tienda que dejó su ex suegro cuando murió, y gracias a esta genera los ingresos necesarios para su hogar, donde convive con su hija. Omaira sueña con poder incrementar sus ventas para poder tener mas ingresos y pagarle así un buen estudio a su hija, por esto busca relizarle unas mejoras locativas a su negocio.
texts.en:
Omaira is known for wanting to do things the best way.  At her 34 years of age Omaira is managing the store that her ex father-in-law left when he died.  Thanks to this she generates the needed income for her household, where she lives with her daughter.

Omaira dreams of being able to increase her sales in order to be able to have more income.  Then she would pay for a good education for her daughter.  Therefore she wants to make some repairs to improve her business.

loans.use: to renovate her store.

loans.name: Victor Andrés

texts.es: El joven Víctor Andrés es un emprendedor quien inicia hace unos meses su propio negocio donde presta el servicio de cafetería en una vereda el municipio de Bello localizado al norte de Antioquia. Dado que el dueño del local donde tenía anteriormente su negocio lo extorsionó, requiere actualmente de la compra de nuevo surtido en productos tales como snacks, café, panes y gaseosas para mejorar el existente del nuevo local donde tiene su cafetería y poderle prestar a sus clientes un mejor surtido. El sueño del joven Víctor Andrés es abrir otro local.
texts.en: Young Víctor is an entrepreneur who started his own business a few months ago: a business where he provides coffee shop services along one of the streets in the town of Bello located in northern Antioquia.  Because the owner of the locale where he used to have his business swindled him, he needs now to buy a new assortment of products like snacks, coffee, bread and soft-drinks to improve the existing inventory in the new locale he now has his coffee shop in and be able to provide his customers with a better assortment.  Víctor Andrés’ dream is to open another locale.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his coffee shop.

loans.name: Elmer

texts.es: Elmer Evelio, tiene la edad  de 29 años, está divorciado, vive con su hijo y su nueva pareja actual. El con el crédito pretende comprar lo materiales necesarios para asistir su apiario como azúcar, madera y pago de mano de obra. El cuenta con el apiario establecido desde varios años atrás y cuenta con la experiencia necesaria para salir adelante con el proyecto pero necesita invertir en la compra de estos materiales pues llega el verano que es un tiempo duro para las abejas. El tiene como meta darle a su s animales todo lo necesario para tener una muy buena cosecha de miel y así venderla y tener la mayor de las ganancias para el bienestar de su familia y tener una estabilidad económica más estable. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Elmer Evelio, 29, is divorced; he currently lives with a son and his new wife.  He intends to use the loan to buy necessary supplies to care for his apiary like sugar, lumber and to pay labor costs.  He has had an apiary for several years now and he has the necessary experience to get ahead with this project but needs to invest in the purchase of these materials because summer is approaching and that’s a difficult time for the bees.  His goal is to provide everything necessary for his animals to produce a good honey harvest to sell and earn the best possible profits for his family’s wellbeing and to have a more stable economic stability.  This is the first loan he’s received from Fudecosur.  He’s had no previous loans from state banks and Fudecosur offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his apiary.

loans.name: Cruz Elena

texts.es: La señora Cruz Elena realiza desde hace 8 años artesanías, actividad con la cual se gana el sustento para ella y sus 4 hijos. Siempre ha querido poder brindarles la mejor educación posible a sus hijos, por lo que anhela que las ventas de su negocio se incrementen y poder mejorarles la calidad de vida. Cruz Elena sueña con montar su propio negocio donde venda las artesanías que elabora y así dejarles una estabilidad económica a sus hijos.
texts.en: Cruz Elena has been making crafts for 8 years, an activity that she earns her livelihood through for herself and her four children.  She’s always wanted to provide her children with the best possible education so she hopes that sales will increase to be able to improve their quality of life.  Cruz Elena dreams with setting up her own business where she can sell the crafts she makes and thus leave a good economic stability to her children.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel de 25 años es un joven padre de 3 hijos de 9, 5 y 2 años. Convive con Amalia hace 10 años. Esta familia habita un hogar propio en la comunidad nativa de Pachacutec, en la provincia de Chanchamayo. Miguel, hombre trabajador y emprendedor. A su edad ya es responsable de una familia, a quien mantiene. Al inició no fue fácil, pero gracias a la ayuda de sus padres quienes le otorgaron parcelas de terrenos pudo iniciar sus propios sembríos. Ahora él cuenta con plantaciones de café y achiote.
